title: War in Ukraine: Ukraine's place in the EU
description:
In this episode of the Sound of Economics Live, Bruegel Director Guntram Wolff hosts Ľubica Karvašová (Prime Minister’s office Slovakia), Alexander Duleba (Research Centre of the Slovak Foreign Policy Association), and André Sapir to debate a proposal by the Slovak government to aid Ukraine’s accession to the EU.

Check our special podcast series, War in Ukraine, which reflect on the implications of Russia’s war in Ukraine in EU energy storage, macroeconomic implications, international finance system and more.
itunes:summary: Should Ukraine's accession to the EU be facilitated?
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
